info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:23PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cleveland, Gaston and northwestern York Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 122 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Gastonia, or near Crowders Mountain State Park, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gastonia, Kings Mountain, Belmont, Bessemer City, South Gastonia, Clover, Dallas, Stanley, Cramerton and Lowell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
